message.body: Dan, got the DVDs, thanks for sending those. It's cool seeing the behind the scenes stuff now. Do you have any still photos from the video shoot?
Umm I think I put on the DVD what I had. I have a few from my phone though
On the behind the scenes DVD, or the other one?
Behind the scenes. If I had any they'd be on there
I think it's just video footage, but that's ok. If you've got anything on your phone that you can send me, that would be cool.
Yeah I just sent u the photos from phobe
Yep. When you thinking you want to meet up again?
Maybe we can do something in June/July?
Yep. I'm free whenever. Just let me know
Glenn saw the emails. Bout sound cool. You lookin to explore the gritty side of the city or the grandeur of the city? I have no problem working with someone else's footage either
I think maybe something in between. I don't think we should go too gritty, but we probably shouldn't go too elegant either.
Yeah I will take a listen think on it and get back to u with ideas
